org.red5.server.api
Interface OnDemandStream

All Superinterfaces:
Stream
public interface OnDemandStream
extends Stream

Extends stream to add methods for on demand access

Author:
The Red5 Project (red5@osflash.org), Luke Hubbard (luke@codegent.com)
